General.Name: SUNEX S.A.
General.Description: Sunex S.A. manufactures and sells solutions based on renewable energy sources in Poland. The company offers heat pumps, solar panels, thermosiphons, assembly and connection systems, containers, pump groups, heat exchange stations, propylene glycol heat carriers, regulators, photovoltaics, hybrid-systems, mounting and connection kits, storage tanks, heat accumulators, assortment, and consumer protection shield. It also provides sheet metal forming services, including bending, cutting, punching, embossing, marking, coining, and perforation. Sunex S.A. also exports its products. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Racibórz, Poland. Sunex S.A. is a subsidiary of Polska Ekologia Sp. z o.o.
